title: Financial Peace University - Credit Sharks in Suits
description:
Videos from the most recent FPU (Financial Peace University) seminar in mp4 format. Learning to handle money and planning for the future from a Christian perspective. Regardless of your religious beliefs, the ideas he teaches in handling money are pretty awesome. If you don't like these videos please go troll elsewhere as I don't care.

Bonus Video: Credit Sharks in Suits

Side Note: Dave makes mention of negotiating pennies on the dollar with creditors within 30 days after a judgement has been ruled, however, (according to the gentlemen who led the class) once that gavel hits, they have you. The best time to negotiate for pennies on the dollar is just before you go to court.
